title: Java is Lava!
contents: When kids thes days want to say something is good, they say it's 'straight fire.' Well, what's more fire than fire? Lava! And that is exactly how fire Java is! Java is such a fast and secure programming language, and I recommend everyone start using it as soon as possible! Strike while the iron's hot,  because this volcano is about to blow!

title: AI? More like AI HATE IT!
contents: Does anyone else feel like AI sucks? Sure, it has it's value and can be save people and companies time and money, but I worry about the loss of creativity and the human perspective. I sure hope I don't sound like an 'old man yells at cloud' grump in the style of Abe Simpson, but I just feel that it's causing more harm than good. The future is looking grim and I am not impressed!

title: Remember Furbies?
contents: As a 90's kid, I used to love playing with my Furby! I know they recently came out with a Furby reboot, but they look like garbage! I wish my kids could experience the OG furby experience. In my opinion, the technology that allowed Furbies to learn how to talk as you interact with them is way more advanced and stimulating than anything on a smart phone/ social media app!
